item.title: Gratitude
item.description: Thank you for visiting. This is my first post. I belive that we should always begin new things with gratitude. I am grateful for all of the various experiences I have had and the many apps and projects I have worked on over since 2013. I can’t believe the project list here covers only 7 years! I am grateful for this site and domain which my dear friend Crystal Rose inspired me to put together.
